biography.firstAppearance: As Tolliver, mentioned) New Mutants #98 (1991), (as Tolliver, seen) X-Force #5 (1991), (as Genesis) Cable #18 (1994)

work.occupation: Former would-be world conqueror, arms dealer, soldier, freedom fighter

connections.groupAffiliation: Formerly Dark Riders (leader), former servant of Stryfe, formerly New Canaanites, Clan Chosen
connections.relatives: Nathan Christopher Summers (Cable, adopted father), Aliya Jenskot (mother, deceased), Stryfe (cloned uncle, deceased), Rachel Summers (Marvel Girl, alternate timeline aunt), Scott Summers (Cyclops, grandfather), Madelyne Pryor-Summers (grandmother, deceased), Alexander Summers (Havok, great-uncle), Gabriel Summers (Vulcan, great-uncle), Christopher Summers (Corsair, great-grandfather), Katherine Anne Summers (great-grandmother, deceased), Philip Summers (great-great-grandfather), Deborah Summers (great-great-grandmother)
